verbose_text: Cahill et al demonstrated that MSC-CM enhances wound healing and epithelial proliferation, and also reduces epithelial cell apoptosis depending on HGF in vitro, whereas MSCs with HGF knockdown are unable to protect against fibrosis in vivo.
evidence: et al demonstrated that MSC-CM enhances wound healing and epithelial proliferation, and also reduces epithelial cell apoptosis
